project.name: HopeCourt
project.slogan: Every booking brings hope — a small act that creates a big impact for students in need.
project.description: Every weekend, our facilities open not just for sports — but for hope. Each booking directly supports underprivileged students with essentials like school uniforms, supplies, and access to extra classes. At HopeCourt, community and purpose come together to build a brighter future, one game at a time.

facilities.name: Swimming Pool
facilities.description: A well-maintained swimming pool suitable for all ages, perfect for training and recreational swimming.

facilities.name: Football Field
facilities.description: A standard size football field with natural grass, ideal for training sessions and friendly matches.
